reviewText: This tape was good - not great - but good. It gives a good snapshot of what was going on in the world in the 1930's.  It's not simply USA centric which is good.  Film footage is not great, but they did the best they could with what was available.  Much of it is from newsreels shown with movies at the time in the US and UK. Not something I will keep and cherish, but it was definitely worth watching.
i like to watch the old movies. mainly the mysterys,suspenseand who done it
